alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Rusk; Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 05 at 1:00AM CDT until October 05 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SMITH...NORTHWESTERN RUSK AND SOUTHWESTERN GREGG COUNTIES... At 100 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Big Sandy to 7 miles northwest of Arp to near Whitehouse, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tyler, Longview, Kilgore, Whitehouse, White Oak, Gladewater, Overton, Bullard, Troup, New London, Arp, Clarksville City, Liberty City, Turnertown, New Chapel Hill, Winona, Warren City, Rolling Meadows, and Laird Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
